credit_line: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: counted running stitch on plain weave foundation
description: A very stylized tree form, with sawtooth-edged braches springing diagonally in from a central trunk to form a chevron. The branches are decorated with voided squares and tiny crosses. Embroidered in red, tan, and white silks on a blue linen ground.
name: Textile
